Case 1:08-cr-00306-JAL Document 438 Filed on 12/03/15 Page 14 of 15
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By:
A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated: _____________________
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: _____________________
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: 10-29-07
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00006505

additional_notes: The document appears to be a signed addendum to a Non-Prosecution Agreement involving Jeffrey Epstein. The signatures are present, and the dates are mostly filled in. The document is from a court filing in Case 1:08-cr-00306-JAL.
